title: Grow Africa, Grow Cardano
description:
How do we grow the Cardano ecosystem in Africa?

The same way we do everywhere, focused initiatives!
importance:
The Cardano community is heavily based in North America and Europe.

Growth elsewhere requires our support and initiative as a community.
success: A wide spectrum of people across Africa, or from Africa, coming together and forming teams to grow our ecosystem with tools provided by us.
